snippet.title: I Made a Fishing Game for This Weird Console (ft. @Goodgis)
snippet.description:
Made a fishing game for the Playdate! Watch this video to see a devlog of the process of making it over the course of two weeks, with a special collab with @Goodgis who made the art for the game.

Catch some Pixel Art tips with Goodgis's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-340vtaKts
Download the game here: https://squidgod.itch.io/by-the-pier
Wishlist Dewdrop Dynasty!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1444080/Dewdrop_Dynasty/

Support me on Patreon! Patrons get early access to my games and the source codes for my games: https://www.patreon.com/squidgoddev

Join my Discord (I'm very active!): https://discord.gg/kDM8RU4aFt
Follow me on Twitter (See what I'm working on early): https://twitter.com/SquidGodDev

Music/SFX from Epidemic Sound. Support the channel and get a month free with my link! https://share.epidemicsound.com/njknzw

#Playdate #PlaydateDev #PlaydateConsole
